meanings.definition: A whorl or set of leaves or flowers growing around a stem at the same level.
meanings.sent1: The plant had beautiful verticils of leaves encircling its stem.
meanings.sent2: The gardener carefully arranged the verticils of flowers in a circular pattern.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the verticils of leaves as tiny umbrellas during the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts swirled like verticils of petals caught in a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: In the forest, the verticils of ferns created a mesmerizing green carpet.

meanings.sent1: The children watched in awe as the verticils in the stream spun around.
meanings.sent2: The boat got caught in a dangerous verticils, causing it to spin uncontrollably.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen sink drain formed a tiny verticils every time the water was drained.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were like verticils of confusion, pulling him in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The tornado created verticils of debris, swirling high into the sky.
